authors.name: Jenifer McKim
authors.affiliation: The Eye, New England Center for Investigative Reporting

title: Investigating child maltreatment
description: An overview of the Federal Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act (CAPTA) and how to use the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) to investigate child maltreatment cases, including information on child fatality review reports, death certificates, court records, FOIA prosecutorial files, child welfare records, and police records.
